t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: How to Remove Items From Amazon Storefront
s: November 22, 2017 - This displays all active product listings on your storefront. Click the "Actions" menu beside the item you want to remove. To remove multiple items at once, click the check box beside each item before you select this menu. Click "Close Listing" to remove the item's listing from your storefront.

t: how to close a registered brand

t: Close Your Account - Amazon Customer Service
